roleset.name: reinforce or support again with proof

example.name: resubstantiate-v
example.text: ...what can be achieved by a man with a mission, a man needing to resubstantiate his manhoood on the golf course.

example.name: resubstantiation-n
example.text: A resubstantiation of the full Q1 DPR *ICH*-1 will be completed by the Risk control staff [reconciling the full trial balances between Q1 open and Q1 close]-1

roleset.note: RESUBSTANTIATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
